question: Which of the following mountain range is also known as the "Dominican Alps"?
explanation: The Cordillera Central of the Dominican Republic is also known as the Dominican Alps. Cordillera Central mountain range runs through the Hispaniola Islands which forms the highest mountain range in the Dominican Republic and all of the Caribbean region. The Cordillera Central, possess cool temperature and scenic beauty, is connected to Massif du Nord of Haiti and houses Pico Duarte, La Pelona, Jose Armando Bermudez National Park.
